mcqs.question: - Which option in MS Excel is not available in Page Layout Tab?
Which option in MS Excel is not available in formulas?
______ Worksheet data and printing pages are controlled by which option?
______ Print preview and print options are shown at top and bottom.
We can protect a worksheet from modification using __ option.

true_false.question: MS Excel cannot insert a watermark.
We cannot remove page breaks manually once applied.
Orientation is available in Page Layout tab.
Margins can be set at top, bottom, left, and right of page.
We can protect a worksheet from changes by using Protect Sheet option.
